item.description:
Support Local Artists at the fabulous Y + Art Sale on Saturday, Sept 13, 2008 at 19 Irving Street, Cambridge, MA. Already we have 4 painters, a photographer, quilt maker, jewelry maker, sweater maker, and two guitarists. In addition, one woman will be selling work from artists from Africa.

Come check it out!

If you'd like to sell your work at the sale, please contact Sarah Dornin at scribblersarah@gmail.com.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red shirt with a name tag that says Sarah Dornin
item.name: Y + Art Sale
